summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3832 for the improvement of the alley in block 13, Brooklyn Addition, being the alley between University Way and 15th Avenue Northeast, from East 41st Street to East 42nd Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47065, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
